channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: We have a large tree outside our house which has large parts that are dead. We are concerned that the dead parts may break off in windy weather and fall onto parked cars., 22nd April
item.description:
The tree is outside numbers 29 and 31, opposite the postbox. We have noticed the dead branches as a result of the spring growth.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 29, Eldon Road, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lights off around Pilley Lane and Leckhampton Road, 22nd April
item.description:
A load of these street lights are not working all of a sudden. Pilley Lane close to the junction with Leckhampton Road and along Leckhampton Road by the new Co Op.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 170-172, Leckhampton Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
